scripts.setup: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run generate && mkcert localhost && pnpm run setup:env
scripts.dev:a: concurrently "pnpm --filter admin-api run dev" "pnpm --filter admin-web run dev"
scripts.build:a: pnpm run setup:prod && pnpm --filter admin-web run build
scripts.build:admin-web: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm --filter admin-web run build
scripts.dev:u: concurrently "pnpm --filter user-api run dev" "pnpm --filter user-web run dev"
scripts.build:u: pnpm run setup:prod && pnpm --filter user-web run build
scripts.build:user-web: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm --filter user-web run build
